nodes.documentation:
@notice TokenStaking contract library allowing to perform two-step stake
 top-ups for existing delegations.
 Top-up is a two-step process: it is initiated with a declared top-up value
 and after waiting for at least the initialization period it can be
 committed.
nodes.name: TopUps

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Top-up value must be greater than zero"

attributes.documentation:
@notice TokenStaking contract library allowing to perform two-step stake
 top-ups for existing delegations.
 Top-up is a two-step process: it is initiated with a declared top-up value
 and after waiting for at least the initialization period it can be
 committed.
attributes.name: TopUps
instantComplete

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Stake for the operator already deposited in the escrow"

attributes.type: literal_string "Stake for the operator already deposited in the escrow"
attributes.value: Stake for the operator already deposited in the escrow

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Top-up value must be greater than zero"

attributes.type: literal_string "Top-up value must be greater than zero"
attributes.value: Top-up value must be greater than zero

attributes.name: initiate

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Stake for the operator already deposited in the escrow"

attributes.type: literal_string "Stake for the operator already deposited in the escrow"
attributes.value: Stake for the operator already deposited in the escrow

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Top-up value must be greater than zero"

attributes.type: literal_string "Top-up value must be greater than zero"
attributes.value: Top-up value must be greater than zero

attributes.name: commit
cancel
isUndelegating

params.operator: Operator The operator from which the stake is recovered.
Operator The operator with a pending stake top-up.

initiate(TopUps.Storage storage,uint256,.details: This function should be called only for active operators with initialized stake.

params.operator: Operator The operator with existing delegation to which the tokens should be added to.
params.operatorParams: Parameters of that operator, as stored in the staking contract.
params.value: Top-up value, the number of tokens added to the stake.

instantComplete(TopUps.Storage storage,u.details: This function should be called only for not yet initialized stake.

params.operator: Operator The operator with existing delegation to which the tokens should be added to.
params.operatorParams: Parameters of that operator, as stored in the staking contract.
params.value: Top-up value, the number of tokens added to the stake.

instantComplete(TopUps.Storage storage,u.return: New value of parameters. It should be updated for the operator in the staking contract.

cancel(TopUps.Storage storage,address).notice: Cancels pending, initiating top-up. If there is no initiating top-up for the operator, function does nothing. This function should be used when the stake is recovered to return tokens from a pending, initiating top-up.

commit(TopUps.Storage storage,address,ui.notice: Commits the top-up if it passed the initialization period. Tokens are added to the stake once the top-up is committed.

initiate(TopUps.Storage storage,uint256,.notice: Initiates top-up of the given value for tokens delegated to the provided operator. If there is an existing top-up still initializing, top-up values are summed up and initialization period is set to the current block timestamp.

instantComplete(TopUps.Storage storage,u.notice: Performs top-up in one step when stake is not yet initialized by adding the top-up amount to the stake and resetting stake initialization time counter.

userdoc.notice: TokenStaking contract library allowing to perform two-step stake top-ups for existing delegations. Top-up is a two-step process: it is initiated with a declared top-up value and after waiting for at least the initialization period it can be committed.
